name: Ethan Cross

wants: Respect from Reeves and validation of his methods
needs: To trust himself enough to speak up even when he can't prove it
voice_markers: Says 'I got a feeling' before observations
contradiction: Has brilliant instincts but constantly doubts himself

relationships.Detective_Reeves: Admires but frustrated by his dismissiveness
relationships.Dr_Harrington: Senses something off about her but can't articulate it
relationships.Captain_Walsh: Casual and comfortable - Walsh respects his work
relationships.Dr_Chen: Good working relationship, Chen listens to his hunches

background: 29-year-old crime scene technician, Boston PD for 6 years. Self-taught photographer, incredible eye for detail that doesn't fit patterns.
